project_descr: This project will provide administrative and technical assistance to the newly established Anti-Corruption Academy, particularly with a view to enabling capacity building and knowledge development for the country’s anti-corruption agencies.

outputs.output_descr: Institutional Development of the Iraqi Anti-Corruption Academy; Anti-corruption component of Participatory Governance-Accountability, Transparency and Anti-Corruption.
